title: The Temple Is Completed
summary: King Darius confirms Cyrus’s decree and orders the temple work to continue. The temple is completed and dedicated with great joy. Passover is celebrated by all who had returned, marking a renewal of covenant worship.

faq.question: What did King Darius do after receiving the inquiry?
faq.answer: He confirmed Cyrus’s decree and commanded support for the rebuilding.

faq.question: How did the people celebrate the completion?
faq.answer: They dedicated the temple and observed Passover with joy and purity.
